answers.answer: Anything prescribed for bipolar is going to be pretty sedating.  The side effects would be the same as if you were taking it for bipolar.  Make sure to get your blood sugar checked out, as it's linked to diabetes.

question: Isn't this for bipolar? What effects are possible if used for insomnia and you do not have bipolar?
title: Can Zyprexa be used for insomnia?
